title: Production of Steel Ingots Plus Castings for Great Britain
notes:
Production Was Seriously Affected By Coal Strikes In October 1919; April-June 1921; May-November 1926. Source: National Federation Of Iron And Steel Manufacturers, The Iron And Coal Trades Review, January 14, 1921, P. 48, And Following Issues.

This NBER data series m01133bb appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.
